```{r input}
V1<-matrix(c(103,102,103,105,104,
            126,127,128,127,128,
            152,153,155,151,153,
            107,109,112,107,108,
            146,152,153,147,151),
          nrow = 5,ncol = 5)
V2<-matrix(c(300,300,300,300,300,
             280,280,280,280,280,
             260,260,260,260,260,
             240,240,240,240,240,
             220,220,220,220,220),
           nrow = 5,ncol = 5)
t1<-matrix(c(11.84,11.89,12.22,12.17,12.23,
             28.73,26.76,27.50,27.82,28.12,
             15.62,15.42,15.29,15.82,15.69,
             19.78,18.91,20.24,19.03,19.01,
             17.94,17.51,17.81,17.10,17.47),
           nrow = 5,ncol = 5)
t2<-matrix(c(22.93,23.15,21.85,22.92,23.41,
             15.32,15.37,15.43,15.22,15.59,
             7.31,7.12,7.00,7.09,7.12, 
             10.45,10.51,11.06,10.82,11.01,
             8.67,8.80,8.02,8.47,8.89),
           nrow = 5,ncol = 5)
t3<-matrix(c(15.67,15.45,15.81,15.95,16.04,
             17.53,18.04,17.79,17.70,17.25,
             9.72,9.52,9.77,9.55,9.63,
             16.55,16.81,16.21,16.60,16.22,
             10.68,11.30,10.73,10.49,11.00),
           nrow = 5,ncol = 5)
```


```{r output}
a1<-sqrt(9*1.83*1.6*10^(-8)/(2*981*9.78858*t1))
t(a1)
apply(t(a1),1,mean)

#法一
t(matrix(lapply(1:length(V), function(i) q1<-(18*pi/sqrt(2*981*9.78858))*(1.83*1.6*10^(-8)/(t1[[i]]*(1+(0.00823/(101325*a1[[i]])))))^(3/2)*(5*10^(-3)/V[[i]])
), nrow=5, ncol=5))

#法二
q1<-(18*pi/sqrt(2*981*9.78858))*(1.83*1.6*10^(-8)/(t1*(1+(0.00823/(101325*a1)))))^(3/2)*(5*10^(-3)/V)

t(q1)
apply(t(q1),1,mean)
```

```{r}
a2<-sqrt(9*1.83*1.6*10^(-8)/(2*981*9.78858*t3))
t(a2)

apply(t(a2),1,mean)

q2<-(18*pi/sqrt(2*981*9.78858))*(1.83*1.6*10^(-8)/((1+(0.00823/(101325*a2)))))^(3/2)*(5*10^(-3)/V2)*((1/t2)+(1/t3))*sqrt(1/t3)
t(q2)
apply(t(q2),1,mean)
```
